availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Larue County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Susannah Harris Goodin in Hardin County, Kentucky, on July 23, 1822. Father of Isaac Goodin, Thomas Goodin, and William Goodin. Farmer in Larue County in 1850. Juror in the case of Isham Waddle in Larue County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Larue County, Hamiltons, p. 409B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Larue County, Buffalo, p. 9B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Hardin County Marriages, 1793-1862, Film #000390788.
KYR-0001-020-1551.
